# CMTag.Value

**Enumeration**

A wrapper type for a value associated with a tag.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Value
```

## Value Types

- **CMTag.Value.int64(_:)**: Represents a 64-bit integer.
- **CMTag.Value.float64(_:)**: Represents a 64-bit floating point number.
- **CMTag.Value.flags(_:)**: Represents a 64-bit wide bitflag field.
- **CMTag.Value.osType(_:)**: Represents a 64-bit identifier used by the operating system.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Represents a 64-bit identifier used by the operating system.
items.name: CMTag.Value.osType(_:)
